GMaps.js — Info Windows

You can draw geometry overlays (which can be a polygon or a rectangle or a circle):

var infoWindow = map.addInfoWindow({
        lat: -12.030397656836609,
        lng: -77.02373871559225,
        content: "<h3>Info Window</h3><p>With HTML content, plus...</p><button>Abstracted Event handlers</button>",
        click: function(e) {
          alert('Consider your event handled.');
        },
        closeclick: function(e) {
          alert('Hey you closed my Info Window!');
        }
      });
